attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Move the TV watershed from 9 pm to 10.30 pm.Half the nations children 10 years of age and over watch TV after 9 pm.Its also the wrong half with parents that do not care.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
